column5: Nice clean room with TV and Wi-Fi +plus another room with Keurig coffee machine,Microwave,and Mini Frig,Futon and and 40in. TV. You could sleep on Futon in an emergency Snoring situation. No contact with Host unless it is wanted. I love contact but understand most people want privacy. My home is in south Arlington that is 10 miles to AT&T Stadium and 14 miles to Downtown Fort Worth. Quiet treed neighborhood with driveway parking.
